reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress great for costume parties, particularly for 1920s-themed events, and appreciate its quality and comfort, noting it's not itchy. Moreover, they consider it worth the price and fun to wear, with one customer mentioning it's perfect for dancing. However, the fit receives mixed feedback, with some finding it great while others say it's too big. Additionally, the dress's sturdiness is concerning, with multiple customers reporting that the straps are flimsy. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sooooo cute!!!
items.body: Got this for an upcoming costume party, and I don't think I've been this excited to dress up since I was a kid! If I had seen this in a store, I would have expected the dress to cost more! It's a good quality, lined, beading and fringe looks so awesome. It zips on the side, and the straps are adjustable. The straps are a bit thin/narrow, but still seem sturdy. I ordered a medium, I'm 5'2", current weight is 155 and 38D, it fits pretty well, it's a smidge snug but not uncomfortable at all (I planned on losing a few pounds, but that didn't happen lol). If you prefer for it to be a bit loose, go with a large. But if you're around 125-155ish, a medium would probably work. And the straps can be let out if you aren't a shorty like me! Read more
items.author: Michelle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Many compliments!
items.body: Excellent, stylish and received many compliments. Ordered a larger size. Read more
items.author: Linda K Johnson

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars So cute
items.body: My address arrived on time. The color is spot on and it is as described! The 20s flapper dress is beautiful. I am 5â€™3 and 168 pounds I got a large I have a hourglass figure and it fits like a glove. I slid it on and did not need to use the zipper. The tassels go a little bit below my knees, but it will be perfect for dancing. The zipper has a weird bin to it, but Iâ€™m going to iron it straight. I love the dress. I will put pictures up on New Yearâ€™s Eve. At the Gatsby Ball in Las Vegas, The only reason I gave it a four star because the zipper has a bend in it and it will not lay flat so I will iron it. Happy with my purchase , worth it and it feels good on. Read more
items.author: Heather Pendelton

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute flapper dress and accessories
items.body: Very cute costume with great accessories. Sizing was perfect. Read more
items.author: cpn291

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous!
items.body: Gorgeous in person and on. Flattering, fit well, there were a few tassels I had to trim, but overall it exceeded my expectations big time. The zipper can get snagged on the fabric so be careful, but thatâ€™s just the nature of the fabric, not indicative of quality. Such a great find for the price. Read more
items.author: Katrina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort and razzle dazzle value
items.body: A great value dress! I bought the medium, I'm 5'2" and 155lb. The dress fits a little tight on the hips, but not uncomfortably. It stretches nicely and provides plenty of coverage on the chest for my 36C. I make costumes and was pretty impressed with the quality of the beaded/sequins fabric, fringe, and even the zipper (which I did not need to open to slip into the dress, but tested it afterward nonetheless). Other than the occasional stray thread, very well made for the price and very comfortable. I bought it a week in advanced of my event to give myself time to return it if needed for a different size or better quality dress or to air it out if I wanted to keep it. I don't need to do either. No smell, and I'll be keeping this for my event. I'm so excited! Read more
items.author: Taylor Patton

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Ehh.
items.body: It felt cheap when it put it on. Didnâ€™t love the fabric material. Read more
items.author: ivanova1st

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars cut for larger chested women
items.body: I quite literally ordered the ten best reviewed and looking flapper dresses off of Amazon. This one is likely a better choice for a larger busted straight sized women. I am typically a size six and this fit me perfectly on the bottom, but gaped and puckered alarmingly in the armpits, and the only way to stop my boobs from falling out when leaning over is to tighten the straps so much it practically looks like a sleeveless dress instead of a strappy dress. The combo of the fringe and sequin is very fun but a step up from just sequins dresses. Construction is on par with other flapper dresses at this price point. I do wish the fringe was a bit thicker, or there were one or two more rows, since the placement left it feeling a little bit sparse at times, compared to other similar dresses at this price point. if you have a larger chest and you're looking for a comfortable sexy 80's does 20's flapper dress for a night out, you'll probably enjoy this. I don't so I don't, but you might. do please note I've caught several brands listing completely different 20's dresses in older listings in order to keep the ratings, so make sure to check customer photos and dates to make sure that they're actually reviewing the same dress that you're buying. Read more
items.author: Jennifer

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 2 Set - Wine Red, Winered, Set - Black, Black Gold, 2 Set - Dark Green, 2 Set - Rose Gold, Rose Gold, Black, Dark Green, Red, White, Light Gray, 2 Set - Black, Set - Dark Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
